articles.author: Natasha Lomas
articles.title: Meta ordered to suspend Facebook EU data flows as it’s hit with record €1.2BN privacy fine - TechCrunch
articles.description: Meta, the company formerly known as Facebook, has been hit with a formal suspension order requiring it to stop exporting European Union user data to the US for processing
articles.content:
It’s finally happened: Meta, the company formerly known as Facebook, has been hit with a formal suspension order requiring it to stop exporting European Union user data to the US for processing.
